full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

**Title**
--------

G9292-24480 Barcode Scanners
------------------------------

### Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3991522410
* **Publication Date**: 2023-05-08
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-05-30 14:00:00 (Local Time)
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Amendment Date**: 2023-06-29

### Tender Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting bids for the supply and delivery of barcode scanners. Please note that the closing time for bid submission has been amended. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by May 30, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Local Time). Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Supply and Delivery Requirements

The barcode scanners must meet the specified UNSPSC codes:

* 43211519 - Electronic reader or E-reader
* 43211701 - Bar code reader equipment
* 43211729 - Optical mark reader

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to bidders covered by the following trade agreements:

**English**
----------------------------

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**French**
----------------------------

* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Ukraine (ALECU)
* Accord économique et commercial global (AECG) entre le Canada et l’Union européenne (UE)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili (ALECC)
* Accord sur les marchés publics de l'Organisation mondiale du commerce (AMP-OMC)
* Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée
* Accord de libre-échange canadi
